title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers (with proxy).

title: langchain-ollama (PyPI)
summary: LangChain adapter giving chat, generate, embed interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, presets, RAG).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Rust CLI that turns Ollama into your shell copilot with context-aware suggestions.

title: ollama-coder
summary: VS Code extension using Ollama for inline code generation & explanation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: load PDFs → Chroma → Ollama for local Q&A.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images, and switches models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU nodeSelector & autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin for code completion, explanation, and chat using Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with POJO models and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting chat, generate, embeddings, and streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE) module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for LLM-powered tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama with serde types and tokio streaming.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings helpers.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with model selector, conversation history, and token metrics.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting Ollama act as generator & embedder in pipelines.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform Qt desktop GUI for Ollama with model manager and chat tabs.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot with per-user model selection, conversation isolation, and group whitelist.
